naslov: ***Mirna oaza 1. red do mora, otok Korčula*** (prodaja)
opis: ~Kuća ~ 149m2 ~Zemljište ~ 521m2 ~U prvom redu s "privatne plažom" uživat ćete u privatnosti ovog jedinstvenog mjesta terase s nestvarnim pogledom na more. Nema buke, nema susjeda koji bi vam pokvario pogled i uživanje u doručku ili večeri s terase ~Otac vlasnika bio je arhitekt i on je sagradio ovu kuću s popločanim dijelom u sredini kuće, kako bi imali sjenu čak i kad je toplo vrijeme, a imate 2 odvojena dijela s terasom u sredini: spavaći dio sa sobama i svaka soba ima svoju vlastitu kupaonicu i toalete. I dnevni dio s otvorenom kuhinjom do dnevnog boravka, roštilj u dvorištu, dnevni boravak i prekrasna terasa sa zapanjujućim pogledom na more, potpuni mir i privatnost ~Kuća je u prvom redu, što znači da nećete moći doći automobilom do kuće. Pristup kući je kamenim stepenicama, nisu prilagođene invalidskim kolicima ili dječjim kolicima, morat ćete nositi svoje kofere, ali budući kupac može prilagoditi put sebi ~Idealno za turizam ili uživanje s obitelji ~21ST CENTURY profesionalan pristup & provjerene nekretnine NAPOMENA: Agencijska provizija za kupca: 3% ***Peaceful Oasis 1st Row to the Sea, Korcula Island*** ~House~149m2, Land~521m2 ~Peaceful oasis 1st row to the sea ~In the front line of the privative beach, you will enjoy the privacy of this unique place, with important spaces, terraces & sea view. No noise, no neighbor to spoil your breakfast view from the terrace ~Owners father was an architect and he build this house with a patio in the middle of the house, to have shadow even when is warm weather, and you have 2 separate part of the villa with the patio in the middle : sleeping part with rooms and each room has it independent own bathroom & toilettes. And the living part with an open kitchen to the living room, Barbecue in the Patio, Living room and this beautiful terrasse in front of the sea. Peace and simplicity of happiness ~The house is in the first line, front of the sea, which means that you will not be able to get to the house with your car. The access to the house is done by stone stairs, it’s not adapted to the wheelchairs or baby pushchairs, you will have to carry your suitcases, but the future buyer can adapt road to himself ~Ideal for tourism or enjoying with family ~21ST CENTURY professional service & verified real estate 21.REAL ESTATE & TOURISM CENTURY d.o.o. www.21stcroatia.com Marmontova 5 21 000 Split CROATIA NOTE: Agency commission for the buyer: 3%
